attributes.action: only allow UK Income Tax and UK National Insurance Payers, under 65, to obtain a British Passport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: New additional criteria for new passport applications and passport renewals be added, to only pass an application if the applicant has paid UK Income Tax and UK National Insurance within the previous 10 years. Those over 65 do not usually pay either UK Income Tax and UK National Insurance so this should not affect them.
